charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE/Drug Possession with Intent to Distribute Methamphetamine

charges.charge_disposition: Dft pleaded guilty to Count 1 in Dist of ID. SENTENCE: Dft committed to custody of BOP for 72 months, to run concurrently with dft's Utah sentence. Upon rls, dft shall be on Supervised Release for 72 months. FINE: $1200.00. SPA: $100.00. AMENDED JUDGMENT FOR REVOCATION: Dft admitted guilt to Allegations 1-4 of Petition. SENTENCE: Dft committed to custody of BOP for Time Served. Upon rls, dft shall be placed on Supervised Release for 46 months. FINE: remaining balance of $830.00 reinstated.
